source_question: 考试或面试的结果可能会怎样？

localizations.name: 学业-考试准备
localizations.description: 分析考生在考试前对相关知识的掌握程度，包括对考试内容的熟悉度和理解深度。
localizations.summary: 知识掌握程度直接影响考试表现，良好的准备是成功的关键。

localizations.name: Fortune-potential outcome
localizations.description: This dimension explores the external factors and opportunities that may influence the outcome of the exam or interview.
localizations.summary: The cards suggest that external circumstances play a significant role in determining the final result.

localizations.name: 学业-心理状态
localizations.description: 考察考生在考试前的心理状态，包括焦虑、紧张等情绪对考试的影响。
localizations.summary: 良好的心理素质有助于应对考试压力，保持最佳状态。

localizations.name: Fortune-inner preparation
localizations.description: This dimension delves into the internal readiness, mindset, and emotional state of the individual facing the exam or interview.
localizations.summary: Internal preparation and mental readiness are crucial factors that can impact the final outcome.

localizations.name: 学业-外部因素
localizations.description: 分析考试当天的外部环境以及可能出现的机遇或挑战。
localizations.summary: 外部环境的变化可能会影响考试结果，合理应对外部因素是成功的一部分。

localizations.name: Fortune-advice from the cards
localizations.description: This dimension provides insights and guidance from the Tarot cards on how to navigate the exam or interview successfully.
localizations.summary: The cards advise focusing on both external opportunities and internal preparation to achieve a favorable outcome.

locales.question: 考试或面试的结果可能会怎样？
locales.overall_summary: 学业三维度分析揭示了考试成功的关键因素，包括知识准备、心理素质和外部环境，三者相互关联，共同影响考试结果。

locales.question: What might be the outcome of the exam or interview?
locales.overall_summary: The three-card spread indicates that success in the exam or interview is influenced by a combination of external circumstances, internal readiness, and guidance from the Tarot cards. Balancing these factors can lead to a positive outcome.
